climbs.name: Your Sister....
climbs.fa: Bruce Hildenbrand and Clint Cummins February 2013

content.description: A fun little diversion from a long season of bolt replacement.  Climb up past two closely-spaced bolts(crux) to an arete and a third bolt to a two-bolt anchor with quick links and chain links for rappel.
content.protection: Three bolts to a two bolt anchor.
content.location: There are two climbs at the toe of the Third Sister on the north side.  This is the climb on the right.

climbs.name: Kid Sister
climbs.fa: Clint Cummins and Bruce Hildenbrand February 2013

content.description: Climb a steep face past two closely-spaced bolts.  Gain the arete above and a third bolt before reaching a two bolt anchor with quick links and chain links for rappel.
content.protection: Three bolts to a two bolt anchor.
content.location: At the toe of the Third Sister on the north side there are two routes.  This is the left route.

content.description:
Start on the saddle between the fourth Sister and the Third Sister. Climb up past two old bolts to reach a notch, clip another bolt and gun for the summit. Also goes at 5.6 CO.

There are two sets of anchors on top about 10 feet apart.  The anchors closer to the edge of the pinnacle with quick links and chains are setup for rappel.
content.protection: 3 quick draws, might want to bring natural colored webbing for the summit bolts.
